video.description:
CLUB ARK ETERNAL

a short film for KENZO

Written & directed by Partel Oliva
	
Director of Photography: Jason McCormick

Movement director: Ryan Heffington
Movement director assistant: Ryan Spencer
	
With dancers/co-choreographers:
Tiffany Aliyah
Jonathan Bourdine
Junji Dezaki
Arne Gjelten 
Habby Jacques
Alexander Pelaez
LaTonya Swann
Calvin Tolbert Jr

Original music by LAFAWNDAH & BR-RR
Field recording by RFHACHE
Additional music by Caroline Shaw, “Courante” performed by Roomful Of Teeth
Sound mix by Nick Weiss

Stylist: Miyako Bellizi
Wardrobe assistant: Synmia Rosine
Hair stylist: Tanya Melendez
Make-up artist: Mia Yang

Edited by Partel Oliva & Edouard Granero
Colorist: Alastor Arnold

Producer: Laure Salgon

video.description:
Sun To Sun
太陽から太陽まで 
Du soleil au soleil

a short film for KENZO

Written & Directed by Partel Oliva

Animation by Sanghon Kim

with
BENI & Yumi Tomioka as Momoko
MoE & Sakika Ikuta as The Dog
Yiran & Tomoko Miyazaki as The Monkey
AYA OKAMOTO & Yuri Iszk as The Pheasant
Kimura Kazue as The Grandmother

Photography by Daniel Fernández Abelló
Edited by Nicolas Larrouquère
Fashion by Victoire Simonney
Casting by Keisuke Fujita
Make-up by NAOMI T. DAKUZAKU at TRON management  
Hair by Yuji Okuda

Produced by
Roman Pichon Herrera at Iconoclast
Gwendoline Victoria at KENZO

Music
“Momoko Rising” written by Jeremy Chatelain
&
"Chaos" from Ecophony Gaia (1990)
performed by GEINOH YAMASHIROGUMI
music by Shoji Yamashiro
arranged by Shoji Yamashiro and Keiji Urata
published by Action Research Co.,Ltd.
Licensed by Victor Entertainment, Japan

Sound design and mix by Nömak

Post-production by Sandrine De Monte
Animation post-production by Armand Beraud
Animation by Jonathan Djob Nkondo, Vic Chhun & Ruben Sellem
Backgrounds by Olivier Blanchin

Special Thanks to 
Emma Yamaguchi, Hirao Inc team,
Gino Delmas, CG Watkins, 
Surkin, Laure Bouchard, Eri.
video.title: Sun To Sun, a retelling of the Momotaro tale.
